quest.name: Wish Upon a Crystal
journal:
 Quest Sync
Yedjina requires assistance at the Great Work.
objectives: Deliver the coin-stuffed pouch to the merchant in Yedlihmad.
Deliver the crystal-stuffed pouch to Yedjina.

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: Aren't you the adventurer that saved Matsya? Excellent timing! If you have time to spare, I would ask a favor of you.

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: You see, the dancers of Radz–at–Han are planning a performance to raise the people's spirits. We alchemists would like to support them with some of the finest accessories we can craft.

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, none of us have time to procure the crystals we need to finish them. It would be a great help if you could fetch the crystals from the merchant at the port at Yedlihmad. Of course, we will provide you with the necessary funds.

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: Many thanks! The merchant is already aware of the situation and should be expecting someone to come by. I'll leave the selection of stones up to your no-doubt impeccable judgment.

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: That should be enough coin for you to buy us whichever crystals catch your eye.

dialogue.name: YEDLIHMADJEWELER
dialogue.text: Welcome! What can I help you with?

dialogue.name: YEDLIHMADJEWELER
dialogue.text: Buying crystals for the alchemists? Yes, I did hear from them about that. Have you decided what you want to wish upon the crystals?

dialogue.name: YEDLIHMADJEWELER
dialogue.text: Haven't you heard? Here in Radz-at-Han, crystals are given along with a wish.

dialogue.name: YEDLIHMADJEWELER
dialogue.text: There's no need to think on it too deeply. Simply envision the wish you would entrust the dancers with granting to their spectators. Once I know that, I can pick out the perfect stone for the occasion.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you wish for?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Inner peace.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Protection from evil.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Prosperity and wealth.

dialogue.name: YEDLIHMADJEWELER
dialogue.text: Hmmm... In that case, emeralds will do quite nicely. In olden times, it was believed that the brilliant green sparkle could heal the heart as well as physical ailments.

dialogue.name: YEDLIHMADJEWELER
dialogue.text: I see. I believe diamonds would be best for that. They say that the radiant gleam and hardiness of the gem makes it particularly effective against the realm's many evils.

dialogue.name: YEDLIHMADJEWELER
dialogue.text: For wealth, I suggest yellow sapphires. The lucid gold glimmer was once believed to invite fortune and secure riches.

dialogue.name: YEDLIHMADJEWELER
dialogue.text: I will provide you with as many as I can within your budget. Be sure they make it safely back to the alchemists at the Great Work.

dialogue.name: YEDLIHMADJEWELER
dialogue.text: Take care in delivering the crystals to the alchemist who sent you.

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are! With some precious stones for me, I assume.

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: These are perfect. Thank you for your help! Do you mind if I ask what you wished upon them?

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: Inner peace... I think we could all use a bit of that after all that's happened. A fine wish, indeed.

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: Protection from evil... It is my sincerest hope that you, as well as we, may live a peaceful life free of disaster.

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: Prosperity and wealth? That would certainly solve a lot of these folks' problems. To have enough to live a comfortable life, content with what you have is valuable indeed.

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: In Thavnair, they believe crystals have the power to grant wishes and heal sickness.

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: It may sound like superstitious nonsense, but crystals are curious things. Part of them exists somewhere between the living and the material. As such, elemental energies can reside within them quite readily.

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: They can influence your mind and spirit using the aether within you, which is precisely why the wish you imbue them with is so important. If the wish is impure, then so shall be the crystal's effects on the user.

dialogue.name: YEDJINA
dialogue.text: I can tell I made the right decision in asking for your help. Please, take this as thanks.

dialogue.name: THOUGHTFULALCHEMIST
